reference.title: Deleting a folder exported to the otm\export subdirectory

section.p: When you export a folder, writes the data to a file in the \otm\export subdirectory on the selected drive. If you no longer need this exported folder file, you can delete it.

ul.li: The folder must have been exported to otm\export.
The exported folder must still exist on the drive that you selected when exporting the folder.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The Folder List window in the main window
Delete Exported Folder… from the Utilities menu
The Delete Exported Folder window (see ) is displayed. Delete Exported Folder windowFigure shows Delete Exported Folder window

section.title: Options and parameters

plentry.pd:
In this box, select:
The drive where the exported folder resides. The Folder list box displays all folders previously exported to the selected drive.
The folder to be deleted from the Folders list box. To see more information about the exported folder, click Details…. The information is displayed in the Folder Details window.
Click OK to return to the previous window.

section.p: To leave the exported folder unchanged, click Cancel.

To delete the exported folder, click Delete. For each selected exported folder, a message window prompts you to confirm that you want to delete the exported folder:
Select Yes to delete the exported folder.
Select No to leave the exported folder unchanged.
If there are no more exported folders selected to delete, click Cancel to return to the Folder List window.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you confirmed to delete the exported folder in the \otm\export subdirectory, it is deleted and cannot be reimported.
